channel.title: directed-graph on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in directed-graph on Hashnopolis

item.title: Package Dependencies
item.description: Solution def package_dependencies(dependencies): result = [] visiting = set([]) visited = set([]) def dfs(node): if node in visited: return visiting.add(node) for dependency in node.dependencies: if dependency in visiting: raise Exception("Have cycle in dependency graph.") if dependency not in visited: dfs(dependency) visiting.remove(node) visited.add(node) result.add(node) for node in dependencies: dfs(node) return result
